ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Blade of Fiery Lamentations
ygData.msgSnippet: correct me if i read this wrong, but dex does not increase speed.  only haste items and spells/songs.  dex will increase your procs if you add some more back.
ygData.messageBody:
correct me if i read this wrong, but dex does not increase speed. only
haste items and spells/songs. dex will increase your procs if you add some
more back.

Shada

> Hmmm, one more question. My dex is hovering somewhere about
> 107 down from
> about 117 due to focusing on AC. Now that I will be weilding
> dual daggers I
> am thinking about speed again. Does anyone know if there is a "magic
> number" close by at which point I would have a big speed
> increase, or am I
> just looking at diminishing returns the higher I go?
>
> Tszaaz
